title: Statement by the Press Secretary on Syria | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
April 12, 2011

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on Syria




We are deeply concerned by reports that Syrians who have been wounded by their government are being denied access to medical care. The escalating repression by the Syrian government is outrageous, and the United States strongly condemnsÂ  the continued efforts to suppress peaceful protesters. President Assad and the Syrian government must respect the universal rights of the Syrian people, who are rightly demanding the basic freedoms that they have been denied.
